function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on social inequality, health, and housing.","Impact":"Failure to address the root causes of social harm and disease propagation.","Mitigation":"Develop a comprehensive approach to include social inequality, health, and housing in harm reduction strategies.","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying vulnerable populations, policy frameworks for addressing housing inequalities.","People":"Vulnerable populations, public health officials, policymakers, housing researchers.","Owner":"Public health agencies, housing researchers, policymakers."},{"Description":"Unexplored concepts such as social murder, ontological security, and home un-making.","Impact":"Missing key factors in understanding and mitigating social harm and disease propagation.","Mitigation":"Further research and exploration of these concepts to integrate them into harm reduction strategies.","Technologies":"Qualitative research methods, interdisciplinary collaboration, data modeling for social impact assessment.","People":"Academic researchers, social scientists, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations, public health agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of recognition of social harm perspective as a building block for housing studies.","Impact":"Missed opportunity to incorporate social harm perspective into housing policy and research.","Mitigation":"Promote awareness and education on the significance of social harm perspective in housing studies.","Technologies":"Digital platforms for dissemination of information, interdisciplinary workshops and conferences, educational material development.","People":"Housing researchers, policymakers, educators, students.","Owner":"Academic institutions, housing research organizations, educational institutions."}]}
